Stats.downloadMessage: Downloads in {date, select, 0 {this week} 2 {this year} 1 {this month} other {custom date}}
Stats.uploadMessage: Uploads in {date, select, 0 {this week} 2 {this year} 1 {this month} other {custom date}}

StreamerForm.templateDescription: Select a template to use its configuration. <important>Warning : You can not change this streamer`s download configuration after selection.</important>
StreamerForm.asTemplateDescription: Whether to use this streamer as a template for other streamers.
StreamerForm.urlDescription: Streamer`s streaming url, with following format: '{`https://www.huya.com/{name}`}' - Huya '{`https://live.douyin.com/{id}`}' - Douyin '{`https://www.douyu.com/{id}`}' - Douyu '{`https://www.twitch.tv/{name}`}' - Twitch '{`https://www.pandalive.co.kr/live/play/{id}`}' - PandaTV
StreamerForm.enabledRecordingDescription: Whether to enable recording for this streamer.
StreamerForm.alertOverrideDescription: Below options will override the global settings for this streamer. If you want to use the global settings, leave these fields empty.

Rclone.title: Rclone
Rclone.operationDescription: Rclone operation, such as copy, move, sync, etc.
Rclone.remoteDescription: Rclone remote name, placeholders are supported. eg: gdrive:records/'{streamer}/{%MM}/{%dd}' <important>It is recommended to keep conf file in the same folder as records and add a --config argument.</important>
Rclone.argsDescription: Rclone arguments, each argument and value should be separated. For example: for --config /path/to/rclone.conf, you should add a new argument with --config then add another argument with /path/to/rclone.conf

Command.title: Command
Command.programDescription: Program to run, such as sh, ffmpeg, etc.

SettingsPage.title: Settings
SettingsPage.globalSettingsDescription: This is where you can update your global settings.
SettingsPage.globalSettingsAlertDescription: Changing this setting may require a manual reboot
SettingsPage.themeSettingsDescription: Customize the appearance of the app. Automatically switch between day and night themes.
SettingsPage.themeSettingsFontDescription: Set the font you want to use in the application.
SettingsPage.themeSettingsThemeDescription: Select the theme for the application.

WebSettingPage.title: Web settings
WebSettingPage.localeDescription: Select the language for the web interface.

GlobalPlatformConfig.partDescription: The delay between each part download retry.
GlobalPlatformConfig.fetchDelayDescription: The delay between each platform fetch request.

Huya.cdnDescription: Huya primary CDN used to fetch the video stream. By default, it is set to AL. Possible values are AL, TX, HW, WS, HS, HY.
Huya.sourceFormatDescription: Select the source format of the Huya live stream. Default is set to flv. <important> Huya HLS stream is not available for all streams. It is recommended to use flv sources as some streams has no hls streams. Please use Streamlink to download HLS sources.</important>
Huya.bitrateDescription: The maximum bitrate for the Huya video stream. The tool will automatically adjust the closest bitrate available for download.
Huya.cookieDescription: Please copy and paste, invalid cookies will be discarded automatically. <important>Optional</important>
Huya.forceOriginDescription: Enable this option to force original quality and not the compressed one.
Huya.mobileApiDescription: Enable this option to use mobile API for fetching the stream. Mobile API is faster.</important>

Douyin.qualityDescription: The quality of the Douyin video stream. Ordered from highest to lowest quality. The tool will look up for the closest quality available to selected.
Douyin.sourceFormatDescription: Select the source format of the Douyin live stream. Default is set to flv. <important>It is recommended to use flv sources as some streams has no hls streams. Please use Streamlink to download HLS sources.</important>
Douyin.cookieDescription: Please copy and paste, invalid cookies will be discarded automatically. Optional. <important>__ac_nonce='anything' and __ac_signature='anything' must be included</important>

Douyu.cdnDescription: Douyu primary CDN used to fetch the video stream. By default, it is set to tct-h5. Possible values are ws-h5, tctc-h5, tct-h5, ali-h5, hw-h5, akm-h5.
Douyu.qualityDescription: The quality of the Douyin video stream. Ordered from highest to lowest quality. The tool will look up for the closest quality available to selected.
Douyu.partDescription: The delay between each part download retry. Default is 30 seconds.
Douyu.cookieDescription: Please copy and paste, invalid cookies will be discarded automatically. <important>Optional</important>

Twitch.qualityDescription: The quality of the Twitch video stream. Ordered from highest to lowest quality. The tool will look up for the closest quality available to selected.
Twitch.authTokenDescription: The auth token used to authenticate the Twitch account. Obligatory. <important>Read the documentation [https://streamlink.github.io/cli/plugins/twitch.html#authentication] to get the auth token</important>
Twitch.partDescription: The delay between each part download retry. Default is 30 seconds.
Twitch.cookieDescription: Please copy and paste, invalid cookies will be discarded automatically. <important>Optional</important>
Twitch.skipAdsDescription: Use streamlink's --twitch-disable-ads arg <important>Please use Streamlink as download engine, and this option only supports Source quality</important>

PandaTv.qualityDescription: The quality of the Twitch video stream. Ordered from highest to lowest quality. The tool will look up for the closest quality available to selected.
PandaTv.partDescription: The delay between each part download retry. Default is 30 seconds.
PandaTv.cookieDescription: Please copy and paste, invalid cookies will be discarded automatically. <important>Optional, only required for 18+ streams</important>

BaseDownloadConfigs.danmuDescription: Whether to download bullet comments. Default is set to follow the global settings.
BaseDownloadConfigs.cookiesDescription: Cookies to be used for the download. Default is set to follow the global settings.
BaseDownloadConfigs.outputFolderDescription: This is the folder where the downloaded files will be saved. Default is set to follow the global settings. You can use placeholders like: '{title}' The title of the streaming.'{streamer}' The streamer name of the streaming.%Y The year of the streaming.%m The month of the streaming.%d The day of the streaming.%H The hour of the streaming.%m The minute of the streaming.%s The second of the streaming.
BaseDownloadConfigs.outputFilenameDescription: This is the file name of the downloaded file. Same placeholders as output folder are available. <important>Please do not include file extension, it will be automatically added based on the below selected format.</important>
BaseDownloadConfigs.outputFormatDescription: The file extension of the downloaded file. <important>Select the appropriate video extension according your needs</important>
BaseDownloadConfigs.maxBitrateDescription: The maximum bitrate for the video stream. The tool will automatically adjust the closest bitrate available for download. Default is set to follow each platform global settings.

CallbacksConfigs.alertDescription: These actions are asynchronous to the download process and will be executed concurrently.
CallbacksConfigs.onPartedDownloadDescription: Actions to be executed when a video part is downloaded
CallbacksConfigs.onStreamEndedDescription: Actions to be executed when a streamer has ended. <important>Please make sure on parted download has finished</important>
CallbacksConfigs.newActionDescription: Create a new action callback to be triggered when a new event occurs.
CallbacksConfigs.actionTypeDescription: Type of action to be triggered.
CallbacksConfigs.actionStateDescription: Whether to enable or disable the action.

GlobalSettings.engineDescription: The engine used for the download. Defaults to FFmpeg. <important>FFmpeg is recommended for most users. Use streamlink only when downloading HLS sources.</important>
GlobalSettings.danmuDescription: Whether to download bullet comments. Default is set to false.
GlobalSettings.deleteFilesDescription: Enable files deletion after download, if disabled, files will be kept in the download folder. <important>It only works when onPartedDownload or onStreamEnded callbacks are not set.</important>
GlobalSettings.outputFolderDescription: This is the folder where the downloaded files will be saved. You can use placeholders like: '{title}' The title of the streaming.'{streamer}' The streamer name of the streaming.%Y The year of the streaming.%m The month of the streaming.%d The day of the streaming.%H The hour of the streaming.%M The minute of the streaming.%S The second of the streaming.
GlobalSettings.outputFilenameDescription: This is the file name of the downloaded file. Same placeholders as output folder are available. <important>Please do not include file extension, it will be automatically added based on the below selected format.</important>
GlobalSettings.outputFormatDescription: The file extension of the downloaded file. <important>Select the appropriate video extension according your needs</important>
GlobalSettings.minPartDescription: The minimum size of a parted download. If the download size is less than this value, the download will be deleted.
GlobalSettings.maxPartDescription: The maximum size of a parted download. If the download size exceeds this value, the download will be parted. If the value is 0, it will use the default value of 2.5GB.
GlobalSettings.maxPartDurationDescription: The maximum duration of a parted download. If the download duration exceeds this value, the download will be parted. <important>It has priority over the maximum parted download size</important>
GlobalSettings.maxConcurrentDownloadDescription: The maximum number of concurrent downloads. If the number of downloads exceeds this value, the download will be queued. Default is set to 5. <important>Change this field according to your streamers count and network conditions</important>
GlobalSettings.maxConcurrentUploadDescription: The maximum number of concurrent uploads. If the number of uploads exceeds this value, the upload will be queued. Default is set to 3.
GlobalSettings.downloadRetryDelayDescription: This is the delay (in seconds) used to check if a streamer is still live after a failed download (usually encountered when the streamer goes offline or network issues). Increasing this value will reduce the number of requests to the platform. Default is set to 10 seconds.
GlobalSettings.downloadCheckIntervalDescription: This is the interval (in seconds) used to check if a streamer is live or not. Increasing this value will reduce the number of requests to the platform. Default is set to 60 seconds.
GlobalSettings.maxDownloadRetriesDescription: The maximum number of stream download retries. If the number of retries exceeds this value, the stream session will be considered as finished. Default is set to 3.
GlobalSettings.useBuiltInSegmenterDescription: Whether to use FFmpeg built-in segmenter for parting downloads. Default is set to false. <important>Enabling this feature will reduce platform API calls.</important>
GlobalSettings.useBuiltInSegmenterNoteDescription:
* Only works with time-based parting
* Streamer's title won't be updated during download
* Dashboard streamers real time bitrate updating will be disabled
* Please use time placeholders in the filename
GlobalSettings.exitOnDownloadErrorDescription: If a input stream returns an error, ffmpeg will exit immediately. Default is set to false.
GlobalSettings.enableFixFlvDescription: Enable FLV AVC fix. Some streams may change video data parameters during the stream. This option will split the flv file when the video data parameters change. Default is set to false. <important>CPU and RAM usage will be increased</important>
GlobalSettings.combineHlsFilesDescription: Combine HLS files into one file. Default is set to false.

TableToolbar.selectedItems: {selectedCount, plural, =0 {no items selected} =1 {one selected} other {# selected}}

Pagination.selectedMessage: {selectedCount, plural, =0 {no rows selected} =1 {one row selected} other {# rows selected}} {totalCount, plural, =0 {} other {of # rows}}

Actions.deleteConfirmationDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete {count, plural, =0 {no items} =1 {one item} other {# items}}.

LoginPage.title: Welcome back!
LoginPage.description: Please enter your credentials to login.
